Cameras.name: Sony DSC-RX100 Digital Camera
Cameras.specs: Model: DSCRX100B. <b>Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 Highlights</b><br><br><ul class="noindent"><li>20.2MP 1" Exmor CMOS Sensor</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>BIONZ Image Processor</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Zeiss Vario-Sonnar T* f/1.8-4.9 Lens</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>28-100mm (35mm Equivalent)</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>3.0" 1,229k-Dot Xtra Fine LCD Monitor</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Full HD 1080p Video Recording at 60 fps</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Optical SteadyShot Image Stabilization</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>ISO 6400 and 10 fps Continuous Shooting</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Manual Control Ring and PASM Settings</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Aluminum Body with Built-In Pop-Up Flash</li><li style="list-style: none"><br><br><b>Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 Bundle includes</b><br><br></li><li>Focus 5 Piece Digital Camera Accessory Kit</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Focus Deluxe 8 Inch Table Tripod</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Sony DSC-TX30/B 18 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.3-Inch OLED (Black)</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Secure Digital SD/SDHC/MMC 2.0 USB Card Reader</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Foam Floating Strap for Camera - Yellow</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Focus Micro-fiber Cleaning Cloth</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>Sony 16GB microSDHC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li><li>FC-CA15B-M Standard Medium Digital Camera Case</li><li style="list-style: none"><br><br>Housed in a sophisticated aluminum body, the Sony DSC-RX100 Digital Camera (Black) features a 20.2 megapixel Exmor CMOS image sensor that excels in ultra low-light situations. It's equipped with a brilliant f/1.8 Carl Zeiss Vario-Sonnar T Lens with a focal length of 10.4-37.1mm (35mm equivalent: 28-100mm). It also has an integrated pop up flash. You can record ultra high-definition still images in JPEG format, RAW format, or even both simultaneously. The camera also affords Full HD 1080p video capture at 60 frames per second (fps). Plus, it supports a full range of controls for video and still shooting that range from iAUTO to P/A/S/M (Program, Aperture Priority, Shutter Priority and Manual).<br><br>The RX100 is loaded with shot-enhancing features and high-quality components. The Exmor CMOS image sensor and refined BIONZ image processor work together to facilitate fast DSLR-like focusing speeds even in low-light - and without sacrificing any detail. The lens supports 3.6x optical zoom and 7.2x clear image digital zoom. It also features a multi-layered T coating that dramatically reduces ghost and flare caused by light reflection. For added convenience, the RX100 is equipped with a 3" Xtra Fine LCD display so you'll be able to quickly scroll through menus and pictures. The display even features WhiteMagic technology for increased visibility under intense sunlight.<br><br>Other features include a customizable function button that supports up to seven different functions and a memory recall (MR) that can memorize up to three groups of preferred settings.
